messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Unschoolers in Mass.?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Rue!  We would love to meet others, too!  A picnic is a great idea. Do you live out towards Boston?  Thanks for all of the info.  I have looked online and
messages.messageBody:
Hi Rue! We would love to meet others, too! A picnic is a great idea.
Do you live out towards Boston? Thanks for all of the info. I have
looked online and that's where I found the unschooling group in
Arlington/Belmont area which is about an hour from us. The local
homeschool group is just that - a HOME SCHOOL group so it would be nice
to meet other unschoolers IRL. Thanks again Rue! Sharon



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Unschoolers in Mass.?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Sharon - Have you joined ma home learning association or ma homeschoolers on yahoogroups?  I know of a few homeschooling groups, but I haven t met any other
messages.messageBody:
Hi Sharon - Have you joined ma home learning association or ma homeschoolers
on yahoogroups? I know of a few homeschooling groups, but I haven't met any
other unschoolers yet. The groups I know of are: LEAF Network (covers
Blackstone Valley area), South Shore Home Schoolers (Bridgewater/Halifax
area), PALS (in Plymouth), and one on the Cape that I can't think of the
name of, but can find if you want it. You could check out the MHLA website
for a group near you.
I've been thinking we should put together a MA unschooling dotcom picnic.
We'd love to finally meet another unschooling family. ~Rue


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Unschoolers in Mass.?
messages.msgSnippet: Hello!  I noticed a few families are from Mass.  I have yet to meet any unschoolers close to us and was wondering if anyone knows of groups in central or
messages.messageBody:
Hello! I noticed a few families are from Mass. I have yet to meet any
unschoolers close to us and was wondering if anyone knows of groups in
central or western Mass. We live in south central Mass. but I have
only found one group and they are located closer to Boston. Thanks
again for your help and encouraging emails! Sharon
